review: I love this product, it does exactly what it states. I love it now I enjoy watching my T.V. Thanks Google and Android.
author: Nikki's reviews

review: Nice piece of technology. Does overheat after extended use.  Makes watching Netflix easier. Can't binge watch anything though.
author: Henrich

review: Just started my switch away from apple and loving everything about Google and other devices.
author: j

review: Easy to use. Great for Netflix. Quality of video is rough from time to time. Make sure you have a good wireless router to improve quality.
author: Chris Mancini

review: DOES NOT WORK ON A MAC ROUTER. DO NOT PURCHASE. Google doesn't tell you anything until the installation is complete.  Only way to get it to work is to disable your router's security.Unless you program routers for a living, don't purchase it if you run a Mac router.
author: M. Jacobsen "Conservative Man"
